text.div:
Provenance participant role

The role that a provenance participant played

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/provenance-participant-role defines the following codes:

Lvl Code Display Definition
1 enterer Enterer A person entering the data into the originating system
1 performer Performer A person, animal, organization or device that who actually and principally carries out the activity
1 author Author A party that originates the resource and therefore has responsibility for the information given in the resource and ownership of this resource
1 verifier Verifier A person who verifies the correctness and appropriateness of activity
2   legal Legal Authenticator The person authenticated the content and accepted legal responsibility for its content
1 attester Attester A verifier who attests to the accuracy of the resource
1 informant Informant A person who reported information that contributed to the resource
1 custodian Custodian The entity that is accountable for maintaining a true an accurate copy of the original record
1 assembler Assembler A device that operates independently of an author on custodian's algorithms for data extraction of existing information for purpose of generating a new artifact.
1 composer Composer A device used by an author to record new information, which may also be used by the author to select existing information for aggregation with newly recorded information for the purpose of generating a new artifact.

name: ProvenanceParticipantRole
title: Provenance participant role
description: The role that a provenance participant played

A device used by an author to record new information, which may also be used by the author to select existing information for aggregation with newly recorded information for the purpose of generating a new artifact.
